required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: COVID-19-associated Anxiety of Pregnant Women for Anomalies, Stillbirth and Preterm Labor
clinical_study.official_title: COVID-19-associated Anxiety of Pregnant Women for Anomalies, Stillbirth and Preterm Labor - CAASPtrial

brief_summary.textblock: Capture of anxiety for anomalies, stillbirth and preterm Labor of pregnant women during COVID-19 pandemia

primary_outcome.measure: anxiety for anomalies during COVID-19-pandemic and before (percentage difference in agreement to the items of the questionnaire)
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of self-reported anxiety by a questionnaire and State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) and comparison with different empiric studies of anxiety for anomalies in pandemics

primary_outcome.measure: anxiety for stillbirths during COVID-19-pandemic and before (percentage difference in agreement to the items of the questionnaire)
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of self-reported anxiety by a questionnaire and State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) and comparison with different empiric studies of anxiety for stillbirths in pandemics

primary_outcome.measure: anxiety for preterm labour during COVID-19-pandemic and before (percentage difference in agreement to the items of the questionnaire)
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of self-reported anxiety by a questionnaire and State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) and comparison with different empiric studies of anxiety for preterm labour in pandemics

study_pop.textblock: pregnant women between 33 until 37 weeks of Gestations with planned Labor in University Hospital of Halle or St.Elisabeth and St.Barbara Hospital Halle, Germany

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- consenting ability
Exclusion Criteria:
- language barrier
- uncompleted questionary
